siteMetadata.title: Wild Motion Films | Kevin Babey | End to end video production
siteMetadata.description: With over 10 years experience, Kevin offers end-to-end video production, 4.6K, 4K, Ultra HD and 1080p filming, multi-camera and video editing to clients in broadcast, corporate, charities, business and natural history.
siteMetadata.author: Kevin Babey
